item.title: Human pose researches: skeleton, SMPL and humannerf
item.description: Human pose estimation is a widely studied in computer vision areas, this article reviews the detail of popular human pose estimation pipleline and methods. OpenPose OpenPose is a widely used framework for 2D pose estimation. The github link is: https://github.com/CMU-Perceptual-Computing-Lab/openpose. From 2016, this team published 4 different paper about how to estimate the 2D poses. Convolutional pose machines paper link: convolutional pose machines This paper shows a systematic design of how convolutional network can be incorporate into the pose machine framework.
